title: Blank Bullets - Blank Bullets EP
description:
Blank Bullets - Blank Bullets EP (2013)

01 - Man of Value
02 - All You Know
03 - Asphyxia
04 - Your Addiction
05 - Silver Platter

-----

Alternative Rock, MP3, 320 kbps

-----

Bio:

For a group that formed so haphazardly, the alternative rock band Blank Bullets seems to have come into its own.

In January 2011, guitarists Joe Peplowski and Peter Baylis approached a stranger (Evan Marois) at their school to sing for their band. At the time, they did not realize that together they would eventually create music that would persuade a fan of a YouTube video of their performance (Vincent Gosselin, bass) to plead to be a part of it, along with his brother (Sam Gosselin, drums). The stars aligned and Blank Bullets recovered from a hiatus in the summer of 2012 by becoming a five-piece alternative rock band.

Together, the group would draw its influences from a variety of styles from blues-rock to '90s grunge to contemporary indie rock to psychedelic music of the Ã¢â‚¬Ëœ60s, all while crafting a sound unique to Blank Bullets. Thanks to a blend of styles of rock that appeal to a wide variety of people and their tight group dynamic, the band since gained critical acclaim and has played shows all over Montreal and its surrounding cities.

Blank Bullets released their debut EP September 6, 2013.
